metadata.methodology: ONLY measurable predictions with specific targets, deadlines, and verifiable outcomes

rules.1: Must have specific target (price, percentage, yes/no event)
rules.3: Must be verifiable (can objectively determine right/wrong)

pundits.name: Balaji Srinivasan
pundits.bio: Entrepreneur, angel investor, and tech philosopher. Former CTO of Coinbase and General Partner at a16z.

predictions.claim: Bitcoin will reach $1,000,000 within 90 days
predictions.quote: I will mass $1M bet that Bitcoin will hit $1M in 90 days.
predictions.outcome_notes: Bitcoin was at ~$27,000 on June 17, 2023. Balaji paid the bet.

predictions.claim: Major US banks will fail within 6 weeks
predictions.quote: Banks are going to fail. Many of them. This is the beginning of a banking crisis.
predictions.outcome_notes: SVB, Signature Bank, and First Republic all failed in March-May 2023.

predictions.claim: More crypto companies will collapse after FTX within 3 months
predictions.quote: This is going to ripple through the entire industry. Many more will fall.
predictions.outcome_notes: BlockFi, Genesis, Voyager collapsed following FTX.

pundits.name: Jim Cramer
pundits.bio: Host of CNBC's Mad Money. Former hedge fund manager. Known for his stock picks and market calls.

predictions.claim: SVB Financial will NOT collapse
predictions.quote: Silicon Valley Bank is fine. Don't worry about it.
predictions.outcome_notes: SVB collapsed 2 days later - largest bank failure since 2008

predictions.claim: Nvidia stock will decline from current levels by Q1 2024
predictions.quote: Nvidia has had an incredible run but I think it's time to ring the register.
predictions.outcome_notes: NVDA went from ~$450 to ~$900 (+100%)

predictions.claim: S&P 500 will end 2024 higher than it started
predictions.quote: I'm bullish on 2024. This is going to be a good year.

predictions.claim: S&P 500 will NOT drop more than 20% due to coronavirus
predictions.quote: This is not going to tank the market. People are overreacting.
predictions.outcome_notes: Market crashed 35% in March 2020

predictions.claim: Bear Stearns will NOT fail
predictions.quote: Bear Stearns is fine. Do not take your money out.
predictions.outcome_notes: Bear Stearns collapsed 5 days later, bought by JPM for $2/share

predictions.claim: Peloton stock will be higher in 6 months
predictions.quote: Peloton is oversold. This is an opportunity to buy.
predictions.outcome_notes: Peloton fell another 80% after recommendation

predictions.claim: Netflix stock will be higher by end of H1 2022
predictions.quote: Netflix is the king of streaming. Buy Netflix.
predictions.outcome_notes: Netflix crashed 70% in first half of 2022

pundits.name: Cathie Wood
pundits.bio: Founder, CEO & CIO of ARK Invest. Known for disruptive innovation investing and bold price targets.

predictions.claim: Tesla will reach $3,000 per share by end of 2026
predictions.quote: Our price target for Tesla is $3,000 by 2026.
predictions.outcome_notes: Tesla currently ~$250. Needs 12x to hit target.

predictions.claim: Bitcoin will reach $1,000,000 by end of 2030
predictions.quote: We believe Bitcoin could reach $1 million by 2030.
predictions.outcome_notes: Long-term prediction still pending

predictions.claim: US CPI will go negative (deflation) by Feb 2024
predictions.quote: We believe deflation is the bigger risk, not inflation. Prices will come down.
predictions.outcome_notes: Inflation fell to ~3% but never went negative

pundits.name: Peter Schiff
pundits.bio: Economist, author, and gold bug. Known for predicting the 2008 financial crisis.

predictions.claim: Bitcoin will fall below $10,000 in 2022
predictions.quote: Bitcoin is heading much lower. I expect it to fall below $10,000.
predictions.outcome_notes: Bitcoin bottomed at ~$15,500, never went below $10k

predictions.claim: Bitcoin will go to zero by end of 2024
predictions.quote: FTX is just the beginning. Bitcoin is going to zero.
predictions.outcome_notes: Bitcoin recovered to all-time highs above $70,000

predictions.claim: Gold will outperform S&P 500 in 2023
predictions.quote: Gold is the place to be. It will crush stocks this year.
predictions.outcome_notes: S&P 500 up ~24% in 2023, Gold up ~13%

predictions.claim: Bitcoin will fall after ETF approval (sell the news)
predictions.quote: Sell the news. The Bitcoin ETF will be a disaster for the price.
predictions.outcome_notes: Bitcoin rallied to new ATH above $70k after ETF approval

pundits.name: Nate Silver
pundits.bio: Statistician, writer, and founder of FiveThirtyEight. Known for election forecasting.

predictions.claim: Republicans will win the House in 2022 midterms
predictions.quote: Republicans are favored to win the House. Our model gives them about 80% chance.
predictions.outcome_notes: Republicans won House 222-213

predictions.claim: Democrats will hold the Senate in 2022 midterms
predictions.quote: Democrats are slight favorites to hold the Senate. About 55% in our model.
predictions.outcome_notes: Democrats held Senate 51-49

predictions.claim: Biden approval will stay below 45% through midterms
predictions.quote: Biden's approval is stuck in the low 40s. I don't see it recovering before November.
predictions.outcome_notes: Biden approval remained 40-43% through midterms

pundits.name: Michael Saylor
pundits.bio: Executive Chairman of MicroStrategy. Bitcoin maximalist.

predictions.claim: Bitcoin will never go below $30,000 again
predictions.quote: I don't think Bitcoin ever goes below $30,000 again.
predictions.outcome_notes: Bitcoin fell to ~$15,500 in November 2022

predictions.claim: MicroStrategy will NOT sell any Bitcoin by end of 2024
predictions.quote: We are not sellers. We will hold our Bitcoin forever.
predictions.outcome_notes: MicroStrategy has continued accumulating, never sold

predictions.claim: Bitcoin spot ETF will be approved by end of 2024
predictions.quote: 2023 is the year Bitcoin becomes mainstream. ETF approval is coming.
predictions.outcome_notes: Bitcoin ETF approved January 10, 2024

predictions.claim: Bitcoin will hit new all-time high (above $69k) in 2024
predictions.quote: Bitcoin is going to break through $69,000 and beyond this year.
predictions.outcome_notes: Bitcoin hit new ATH above $73,000 in March 2024

predictions.claim: US inflation will be below 4% by end of 2022
predictions.quote: Inflation will come down significantly by year end. This is transitory.
predictions.outcome_notes: Inflation was 6.5% at end of 2022

predictions.claim: US will NOT have a recession in 2022
predictions.quote: I don't see a recession this year. The economy is fundamentally strong.
predictions.outcome_notes: US avoided technical recession in 2022

predictions.claim: US will have a recession in 2023
predictions.quote: I think a recession in 2023 is more likely than not at this point.
predictions.outcome_notes: US economy grew 2.5% in 2023, no recession

pundits.name: Larry Summers
pundits.bio: Former US Treasury Secretary. Harvard Professor. Known for early inflation warnings.

predictions.claim: Fed will raise rates above 4% by end of 2022
predictions.quote: The Fed is behind the curve. They will need to raise rates much more aggressively.
predictions.outcome_notes: Fed raised rates to 4.25% by end of 2022

predictions.claim: US inflation will remain above 3% through end of 2023
predictions.quote: This inflation is not going away quickly. Expect elevated inflation through 2023.
predictions.outcome_notes: Inflation remained above 3% through 2023

predictions.claim: Fed will NOT cut rates before July 2024
predictions.quote: The Fed is not going to cut rates as quickly as markets expect.
predictions.outcome_notes: Fed held rates at 5.25-5.50% through mid-2024

predictions.claim: US will avoid recession despite rate hikes through 2024
predictions.quote: A soft landing is possible. I don't think we need a severe recession.
predictions.outcome_notes: US achieved soft landing - inflation fell without recession

pundits.name: Elon Musk
pundits.bio: CEO of Tesla and SpaceX. Owner of X.

predictions.claim: Twitter acquisition will close at $54.20 per share
predictions.quote: My offer is my best and final offer. $54.20 per share.
predictions.outcome_notes: Deal closed at $54.20 in October 2022

predictions.claim: Tesla will have 1 million robotaxis on road by end of 2020
predictions.quote: I'm confident we'll have over a million robotaxis on the road.
predictions.outcome_notes: Zero robotaxis deployed by end of 2020

predictions.claim: Tesla will accept Bitcoin as payment permanently
predictions.quote: In retrospect, it was inevitable.
predictions.outcome_notes: Tesla reversed BTC acceptance in May 2021

pundits.name: Tom Lee
pundits.bio: Co-founder and Head of Research at Fundstrat.

predictions.claim: S&P 500 will hit 5,100 by end of 2022
predictions.quote: We see S&P 500 reaching 5,100 by year end.

predictions.claim: S&P 500 will reach 4,750 by end of 2023
predictions.quote: We think stocks will have a strong year. S&P 500 to 4,750.
predictions.outcome_notes: S&P 500 ended 2023 at 4,769

predictions.claim: Bitcoin will hit $150,000 in 2024
predictions.quote: We see Bitcoin reaching $150,000 this year with ETF inflows.
predictions.outcome_notes: Bitcoin reached ~$73k ATH, ended around $95k

predictions.claim: S&P 500 will make new all-time highs within 12 months
predictions.quote: We think markets make new highs within 12 months. Buy the dip.
predictions.outcome_notes: S&P 500 hit all-time highs by August 2020

pundits.name: Robert Kiyosaki
pundits.bio: Author of Rich Dad Poor Dad. Known for crash predictions.

predictions.claim: S&P 500 will fall 50% from peak by May 2023
predictions.quote: Giant crash coming. Stocks could fall 50% or more.
predictions.outcome_notes: S&P 500 fell 25% at worst, then recovered

predictions.claim: US will enter depression (GDP decline >10%) in 2023
predictions.quote: Greatest depression ever coming in 2023.
predictions.outcome_notes: US economy grew 2.5% in 2023

predictions.claim: Bitcoin will fall to $9,000 by mid-2023
predictions.quote: Bitcoin going to $9,000. Great buying opportunity coming.
predictions.outcome_notes: Bitcoin bottomed at $15,500, never near $9,000

predictions.claim: Bitcoin will hit $120,000 by end of 2024
predictions.quote: Bitcoin going to $120,000. Buy now before it's too late.
predictions.outcome_notes: Bitcoin ended around $95k - not $120k

pundits.name: Bill Ackman
pundits.bio: Founder and CEO of Pershing Square Capital Management.

predictions.claim: Fed will cut rates by June 2023
predictions.quote: The Fed will cut rates sooner than people think.
predictions.outcome_notes: Fed continued raising rates through 2023

predictions.claim: Netflix stock will double within 12 months
predictions.quote: Netflix has made the right changes. This stock is going much higher.
predictions.outcome_notes: Netflix stock doubled from ~$300 to ~$600

predictions.claim: Fed will cut rates in 2024 AND S&P 500 will end year up
predictions.quote: The Fed will cut rates in 2024. This will fuel a market rally.
predictions.outcome_notes: Fed cut rates in Sept 2024, S&P 500 up ~25%

pundits.name: Ray Dalio
pundits.bio: Founder of Bridgewater Associates, the world's largest hedge fund.

predictions.claim: Stocks and bonds will outperform cash in 2022
predictions.quote: Cash is trash. You need assets that keep up with inflation.
predictions.outcome_notes: Cash outperformed stocks (-19%) and bonds (-13%) in 2022

predictions.claim: 2020 recession will be longer/deeper than 2008
predictions.quote: This is going to be worse than 2008. The economic damage is unprecedented.
predictions.outcome_notes: Recovery was fastest ever - V-shaped, ended in 2 months

predictions.claim: China GDP growth will exceed US GDP growth in 2024
predictions.quote: China's rise is inevitable. The relative decline of the US will continue.
predictions.outcome_notes: China ~5% growth vs US ~2.5% but China faced deflation crisis
